“Mrs. Smith is Out”

Stereograph image. A woman sits on Mr. Smith’s lap and receives a kiss on the cheek. Mrs. Smith watches the couple from the background with her hands in the air.

Creator: Wasson, Charles L.

Date: 1901

Type: StillImage

Source: Personal Collection, Cara Finnegan
